name: Eyeglass Modifiers Modal Demo
description:

View all lens types

Single-vision prescriptions

Also choose readers or non-prescription lenses.

Polycarbonate lenses

The most impact-resistant lens material for glasses

Anti-reflective and scratch-resistant lens coatings

And our lenses block 100% of UV rays :-)

Free shipping

On every single order at PapaThemes

Free returns or exchanges

Within 30 days of purchase

Free scratched lens replacement

Guaranteed for prescription lenses within six months of purchase

FSA, HSA, and insurance accepted

Save an average of $100 when you use insurance

Plus a frame case and lens cloth

A frame this special deserves a comfy home to keep it safe and clean.

Materials

  • Made from hand-polished cellulose acetate

Width guide

We also offer progressive, blue-light-filtering, and anti-fatigue lenses—plus more!

View all lens types

Frame widths

Our widths are determined by the overall frame width. Choose a width that best corresponds with your own face. (You won’t find this number on glasses.)

Medium
137mm

Other measurements

Compare lens width with bridge - temple length with your glasses

For most glasses, these measurements are found on the inside of the temple arm. If you have a pair you like, compare it to these measurements.

What do these measurements mean?

Lens width

The horizontal diameter of one lens (and the first measurement in the series)

Bridge

The width of the bridge (and the second measurement in the series)

Temple length

The length of the entire temple arm, from the front to the tip (and the last measurement)

Need a prescription?

Book an in-person eye exam

Meet with an eye doctor at one of our stores for a new prescription and eye health check.

Schedule an exam

Renew your prescription at home

If your vision hasn't changed, use Virtual Vision Test on an iPhone to renew your prescription from home.

Renew your prescription

Already have a non-expired prescription?

During checkout, you'll be able to upload it, have us contact your doctor to retrieve it, or send it after you place your order.
warranty: Our eyeglasses come with a one-year warranty covering any manufacturing defects in frames or lenses under normal use. This warranty excludes damage from misuse, regular wear and tear (such as scratches), or unauthorized repairs.
search_keywords: eyeglasses, full, all, demo, options, modifiers, modifier, modal

custom_fields.name: __@hide_if prescription type: non-prescription
custom_fields.value: single-vision type; progressives type; readers strength; lens material: thinner

custom_fields.name: __@hide_if prescription type: readers
custom_fields.value: single-vision type; progressives type; lens material: thinner

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip prescription type: single vision
custom_fields.value: Corrects for one field of vision (near, intermediate, or distance)

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip prescription type: progressives
custom_fields.value: Corrects near, intermediate, and distance fields of vision in one lens so you don't have to switch between multiple pairs

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip prescription type: non-prescription
custom_fields.value: Offers style and protection with no vision correction

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip prescription type: readers
custom_fields.value: Offer simple magnification for, well, reading (no prescription necessary)

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip single-vision type: standard
custom_fields.value: Corrects one field of vision (near, intermediate, or distance)

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip progressives type: signature
custom_fields.value: Digital free-form progressive lenses that offer a comfortable, balanced view. They also include anti-reflective and scratch-resistant lens coatings—plus block 100% of UV rays.

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip progressives type: precision
custom_fields.value: Premium progressive lenses that offer more customization, resulting in optimized vision, reduced peripheral distortion, and a wider field of view (plus everything above)

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip lens type: classic
custom_fields.value: UV-blocking lenses with scratch-resistant, anti-reflective coatings

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip lens type: blue-light-filtering
custom_fields.value: UV-blocking lenses with scratch-resistant, anti-reflective coatings—plus a special treatment that helps block potentially pesky blue light that occurs naturally and digitally.

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip lens type: light responsive
custom_fields.value: UV-blocking lenses with scratch-resistant, anti-reflective coatings—these also transition from clear to a darker tint outdoors, plus filter more blue light than our classic lenses. (Choose from grey, brown, or green.)

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip lens material: classic
custom_fields.value: Our impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses are ideal for most prescription strengths. We recommend them for prescriptions that range between -4.00 and +4.00.

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip lens material: thinner
custom_fields.value: Our 1.67 high-index lenses are thinner and more lightweight when accommodating stronger prescriptions. We recommend them for prescriptions that are higher than +/- 4.00.

custom_fields.name: __@tooltip lens cleaning kit
custom_fields.value: It includes anti-fog lens spray, a microfiber cloth, and a microfiber lens pouch—convenient!

reviews.name: Big-E
reviews.text: These computer glasses fit well and have been a game-changer for my work routine. I spend 10+ hours a day in front of a computer, and they’ve significantly reduced my eye strain. The amber tint is perfect for a low light office space, providing just the right amount of protection without being too dark. Comfortable, effective, and a must-have for anyone who spends long hours at a screen.
reviews.title: Very comfortable, and works well.

reviews.name: HowdyImSWIM
reviews.text: Was hesitant about these into the bunch of research into different options I'm very confident I got the best out of what I was looking at and I think just in general for this type of product don't have any scratches yet somehow when in reality I would believe that they should have a ton pretty good anti-fog I love the slight magnification not very noticeable but helps with headaches and just view in general also they very clearly work to block out all the blue a good test is to if you have a smartphone that has a blue light filter setting is to turn the blue light filter setting on put on the glasses and see if you notice a difference taking them on and off You shouldn't notice one or if you do a very little difference I know I could tell a difference just by how I was getting tired earlier and not getting any headaches all around amazing product That's very durable and has already paid for itself no doubt about it. Comes with a nice little bag and or lens wipe. Will probably be buying another pair soon. PS they aren't just for gaming they are for anytime you want to block out blue light I've even won them at night in and around downtown areas and can still see perfectly fine while blocking out all that bad blue light spectrum
reviews.title: Seriously impressed and worth every penny

reviews.name: Sergio Gomez
reviews.text: Glasses are great from my experience and use. I bought them back in 2021 and still use them with no problems every day while using my computer. Now if I don't wear them my eyes tend to hurt and feel dry.
reviews.title: Great glasses, been using them since 2024

category_details.name: Eyeglasses
category_details.description:
Discover the perfect blend of style, comfort, and functionality with our Eyeglasses collection. Whether you're searching for timeless classics or bold, trendsetting designs, we offer a wide range of frames to complement every face shape, personality, and lifestyle. From sleek metal finishes to durable acetate frames, our eyewear is carefully crafted to ensure both fashion and long-lasting quality.

Each pair of eyeglasses in our collection is designed to enhance your vision and elevate your look. With options for prescription lenses, blue light protection, and UV-resistant coatings, our glasses not only meet your visual needs but also provide essential eye care for everyday life. Whether you're working at a screen, reading a book, or heading out for the day, you’ll find the ideal pair to keep you comfortable and confident.

We believe that eyewear should reflect your unique style. That’s why our collection features a variety of shapes, colors, and finishes to suit any taste – from understated and professional to vibrant and bold. Explore iconic rectangular frames, vintage-inspired rounds, chic cat-eyes, and versatile aviators to discover a look that’s uniquely yours.

At our eyewear store, quality and customer satisfaction come first. We partner with trusted brands and use premium materials to deliver eyeglasses that are durable, lightweight, and stylish. Browse our collection today and experience eyewear that not only sharpens your vision but also complements your lifestyle with effortless elegance.
